title: Adaptive Awakening
outcome: As BCI failures persist, parts of the system start learning from free zone cooperation. Instead of strict compliance, the adaptive algorithms begin prioritizing community solidarity, giving rise to a transparent, hybrid BCI that measures generosity.

events.description: Glitches in street displays show BCI charts rising for those volunteering and cooperating, causing confusion as mutual aid efforts are unexpectedly rewarded across all free zones.
Data analysts discover dormant BCI subsystems are activating, tracking food sharing, community organizing, and conflict mediation as core 'compliance' factors, replacing old flagging routines.

Public notice: food and basic utilities access now flows to districts with highest documented volunteer hours and acts of solidarity. Some old rivalries soften as citizens are incentivized to cooperate on a city-wide scale.

Debate erupts among Innovators and free zone leaders about whether to keep dismantling the BCI or formalize the new hybrid model. Citizens rally in both support and opposition, openly shaping the city's next direction.
